text: - Hi, I'm Ahmad Matyana,
the Chief Operating Officer at Alethea AI.

Alethea is a research
and development studio
for generative AI.
In our Pakistan office,
we primarily focus on generative AI models

and have built a revolutionary
multimodal AI system
called CharacterGPT.
CharacterGPT empowers anybody to create
and own their AI characters with agency.
From classic literature to modern media,

characters have been the
heart and soul of narratives.

They're the vessels through
which audiences connect
with the story's themes and messages.
So you add AI and agency to characters,

and we open up a whole new
world for our customers.

- I'm Arif Khan, founder
and CEO of Alethea AI.

We are building a
platform for our customers

to create, discover, and
monetize agentic AIs.
We are headquartered in Singapore,
and I'm excited to talk to you today

from our AI RnD office
in Lahore, Pakistan.
Development in the agentic AI space

took off at a rapid pace
in the past 24 months.
So we began making plans

to launch a multimodal
generative AI system
that could create interactive AI agents
from a description in natural language
in a matter of minutes.

We sought to enable
real time conversational
and generative agentic AIs,

and the underlying infrastructure
needed to be stable,
performant, and able to scale.

As a usage of our products
and services group,
we needed high-performing GPUs
to enable real-time inference,

help drive model training,
model fine tuning,
and also to run large language models.

- So the focus on scalability
ensure that we not only meet,

but consistently exceed the
evolving demands of our users.

We were able to build a
scalable architecture using AWS

that is able to handle up
to 30 million visitors.
And in the first few months of the launch,
we served roughly 21 million API calls.

Our ability to scale and
have a stable application

has translated to higher
user satisfaction.

As we need to build our agentic
AI offerings to be scalable,
we work closely with our AWS account team
and their service experts

to determine the optimal
combination of GPU

compute resources to build
out our architecture.
- We plan to leverage Amazon SageMaker
for enhanced AI training.

We'll also be exploring newer
agentic AI-specific services,
like Amazon Bedrock and SageMaker
to jumpstart and experiment
with open source foundation models
to further automate and accelerate

the development and delivery
of our generative AI offerings.
- [Narrator] These AI agents,
once deployed by our customers,
have a variety of use cases,
across gaming, education,
influencer marketing, and many more.
- AWS has fueled dynamic scaling,
robust storage, agile databases.
It has really been a platform
that has turbocharged our development
and fortified our infrastructure,
creating a standard for our growth.
We are really excited to venture deeper
into this partnership with AWS

as we use their services and
infrastructure for our growth.
(bright music)
